basicInfo.name: Gelidus
basicInfo.flavor: Though Gelidus succeeded in obtaining the Shards of Destruction, the curse of destruction awakened Gelidus's madness, causing him to go on a rampage. Ultimately, he was sealed away by the combined efforts of Teo, Orly, and Silvesta.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Extreme Chill. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 70% of Defense.
 - Increases Chance: Extreme Chill chance becomes 50%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To 3 Enemies with Extreme Chill.

Skill 1.name: Tyrant's Memories
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 65% of Physical Attack plus 70% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Extreme Chill. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack plus 85% of Defense.
 - Increases Chance: Extreme Chill chance becomes 70%.

Skill 2.name: Tyrant of the Skies
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 30% of Physical Attack plus 33% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Extreme Chill. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 35% of Physical Attack plus 38% of Defense.
 - Increases Chance: Extreme Chill chance becomes 70%.

Passive.name: Ice Queen's Blessing
Passive.desc:
Self
 - When starting battles with at least 3 Universal hero(es) on your team, HP falling to 50% or lower will heal HP equal to 165% of the caster's Defense. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Grants Damage Resistance. [Always Active]
 - Grants Defense-Based Block Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Effect Probability Reduction. [Always Active]
 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Physical Attack and 65% of Defense 1 time(s) upon using any attack 2 time(s).
 - Using any attack 2 time(s) has a 75% chance of inflicting Extreme Chill. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense-Based Block Rate max becomes 33%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Effect Probability Reduction becomes 26%

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Lania, Spike, meat, anything cooked by Lania, strong people, people who step up to the challenge
profile.story: Though Gelidus succeeded in obtaining the Shards of Destruction, the curse of destruction awakened Gelidus's madness, causing him to go on a rampage. Ultimately, he was sealed away by the combined efforts of Teo, Orly, and Silvesta.

basicInfo.name: Gelidus
basicInfo.flavor: By the lord's command, Gelidus set off on a journey to collect the Shards of Destruction. During this quest, he met Queen Lania and fell in love with her.

 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Tyrant of the Skies
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 28% of Physical Attack plus 30% of Defense 2 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Extreme Chill. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 28% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 30% of Magic Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - When starting battles with at least 3 Universal hero(es) on your team, HP falling to 50% or lower will heal HP equal to 150% of the caster's Defense. [2 Time(s) per Battle]

 - All Enemies

 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 55% of Physical Attack and 60% of Defense 1 time(s) upon using any attack 2 time(s).

スキル強化効果

 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Magic Attack.

profile.story: By the lord's command, Gelidus set off on a journey to collect the Shards of Destruction. During this quest, he met Queen Lania and fell in love with her.

basicInfo.name: Gelidus
basicInfo.flavor: Already from a young age, Gelidus possessed tremendous physical abilities far beyond human limits. His great strength and physical prowess caught the attention of the local lord, and he served under the lord as a warrior.
